label: 大領
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: (alt. tairyô)  a senior district chieftain, administrative head of a district (gun 郡) under the ritsuryô provincial system made up of provinces (kuni), districts, and townships (gô). [律令] [国] [郷]
